article.Heading: People who put honest savings in bank need not worry: CBDT Chief
article.Summary: The data which is not matching with the returns profile of an individual will be penalised, he says.
article.Body:
The process behind analysing the demonetisation data and Jhan Dhan accounts will be done in a very non-intrusive manner, says Sushil Chandra, Chairman, CBDT. So the people, who have put their honest savings in the bank, need not worry, he tells CNBC-TV18.

The data which is not matching with the returns profile of an individual will be penalised, he says.

Najib Shah, Chairman, CBEC, says the government is confident and is trying its best to implement the GST by July 1. The GST laws will be finalised in the next meeting of the GST Council and finally the GST rates for each product type.

Watch video for more.
